name: 霍弘毅
objective: 本課程透過希臘英雄的偉大冒險故事以及希伯來聖經傳統中的聖哲事蹟來探索早期西方文明的兩大源頭（希臘與希伯來文化）所呈現出的主要風貌。
schedule:
We will be reading mainly primary, but some secondary, texts from the Judaic, the Greek, and the Christian backgrounds to Western Literature and Culture. We will also watch movies and read literature derived from the primary sources. Students will have to take notes from the lectures, but will not have to memorize anything, just think about the issues raised. The exams will be open book.

Part 1 The Judaic Revolution: Genesis, Exodus, Psalms
Part 2 The Greek Heritage: Homer, Hesiod, Sophocles, Plato, Aristotle
Part 3 The Christian Difference: Gospel of Mathew, Nicene Creed, Paul Letters
